tpk::MinorPlanet

tpk::MinorPlanet Class Reference

#include <SolSysTargets.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Minor planet.

A target whose position is defined by a set of osculating orbital elements as tabulated in the Astronomical Almanac and supplied by the Minor Planets Center for minor planets.
